transcript.title: APPOINTMENT OF DEPARTMENTAL SECRETARIES
transcript.content:
Fax from APPOINTMENT OF DEPARTMENTAL SECRETARIES
Following Mr Sandy Hollway's decision to take up employment with the
Sydney Organising Committee for the Olympic Games, I shall recommend
to the Governor-General the appointment of Mr Stephen Sedgwick,
Secretary to the Department of Finance, to replace Mr Hollway as
Secretary to the Department of Employment, Education, Training and
Youth Affairs. 1
In Mr Sedgwic+' s place as Secretary to the Department of Finance I shall
recommend thq appointment of Dr Peter Boxall, currently the Principal
Adviser to the reasurer.
